channel.title: Known limitations :: WebLogic Kubernetes Operator
channel.description: The following sections describe known limitations for WebLogic Kubernetes Operator. Each issue may contain a workaround or an associated issue number. NGINX SSL passthrough ingress service does not work with Kubernetes headless service ISSUE: When installing NGINX ingress controller with SSL passthrough enabled --set "controller.extraArgs.enable-ssl-passthrough=true", any ingress rule created subsequently, using SSL passthrough to the individual server service, will fail.
